subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXNPWLOX
WWUS76 KLOX 182209
NPWLOX

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..GUSTY WINDS WILL AFFECT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN CALIFORNIA
THROUGH TONIGHT...

STRONG NORTHWESTERLY FLOW BEHIND A DRY COLD FRONT WILL CONTINUE TO
BRING GUSTY WINDS TO MUCH OF SOUTHWESTERN CALIFORNIA THROUGH
TONIGHT. WINDS WILL BE THE STRONGEST IN THE MOUNTAINS OF LOS ANGELES
AND VENTURA COUNTY...ESPECIALLY NEAR THE INTERSTATE 5 CORRIDOR.

CAZ052-190400-
/O.CON.KLOX.HW.W.0010.000000T0000Z-070419T1000Z/
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY MOUNTAINS-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT THURSDAY...

A HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT THURSDAY.

AREAS OF NORTHWEST TO NORTH WINDS OF 30 TO 40 MPH WITH GUSTS TO
60 MPH WILL AFFECT THE AREA THROUGH LATE THIS EVENING...THEN
SLOWLY DIMINISH LATE TONIGHT.

SUSTAINED WIND SPEEDS OF AT LEAST 40 MPH OR GUSTS OF 58 MPH OR MORE
CAN LEAD TO PROPERTY DAMAGE.

$$

CAZ053-054-190400-
/O.CON.KLOX.HW.W.0010.000000T0000Z-070419T1000Z/
VENTURA COUNTY MOUNTAINS-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY MOUNTAINS EXCLUDING THE SANTA MONICA RANGE-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT THURSDAY...

A HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT THURSDAY.

AREAS OF NORTHWEST TO NORTH WINDS TO 30 TO 40 MPH WITH GUSTS TO
60 MPH WILL AFFECT THE AREA THROUGH MUCH OF TONIGHT. THE
STRONGEST WINDS WILL BE FOCUSED THROUGH THE INTERSTATE 5 CORRIDOR.
WINDS WILL DIMINISH SLOWLY LATE TONIGHT.

SUSTAINED WIND SPEEDS OF AT LEAST 40 MPH OR GUSTS OF 58 MPH OR MORE
CAN LEAD TO PROPERTY DAMAGE.

$$

CAZ040-041-190400-
/O.EXA.KLOX.WI.Y.0099.000000T0000Z-070419T0400Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LOS ANGELES/OXNARD HAS ISSUED A WIND
ADVISORY...WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

WEST TO NORTHWEST WINDS OF 20 TO 30 MPH WITH LOCAL GUSTS TO 40
MPH CAN BE EXPECTED THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING BEFORE DIMINISHING.

WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

$$

CAZ047-190400-
/O.EXA.KLOX.WI.Y.0099.000000T0000Z-070419T0400Z/
LOS ANGELES COUNTY VALLEYS-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LOS ANGELES/OXNARD HAS ISSUED A WIND
ADVISORY...WHICH IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

NORTHWEST TO NORTH WINDS OF 25 TO 35 MPH WITH GUSTS TO 40 MPH
WILL CONTINUE INTO THIS EVENING BEFORE DIMINISHING. THE STRONGEST
WINDS WILL BE BELOW PASSES AND CANYONS IN THE SAN FERNANDO
VALLEY.

WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

$$

CAZ059-190400-
/O.CON.KLOX.WI.Y.0099.000000T0000Z-070419T0400Z/
ANTELOPE VALLEY-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING...

A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

WEST TO NORTHWEST WINDS OF 30 TO 40 MPH WITH GUSTS TO 50 MPH WILL
AFFECT THE ANTELOPE VALLEY THROUGH THIS EVENING. THE STRONG WINDS
WILL CAUSE AREAS OF BLOWING DUST AND SAND...WHICH WILL LOCALLY
REDUCE VISIBILITIES TO ONE QUARTER MILE OR LESS. WINDS WILL
DIMINISH SLOWLY BY LATE EVENING.

WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

$$

CAZ034-035-190400-
/O.CON.KLOX.WI.Y.0099.000000T0000Z-070419T0400Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING...

A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

NORTHWEST WINDS OF 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS TO 40 MPH WILL CONTINUE
INTO THIS EVENING BEFORE DIMINISHING.

WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

$$

CAZ088-190400-
/O.CON.KLOX.WI.Y.0099.000000T0000Z-070419T0400Z/
SANTA CLARITA VALLEY-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING...

A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

AREAS OF NORTHWEST TO NORTH WINDS OF 25 TO 35 MPH WITH GUSTS NEAR
50 MPH WILL AFFECT THE AREA THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING...THEN
DIMINISH LATER IN THE EVENING. THE STRONGEST WINDS WILL BE THROUGH
AND BELOW PASSES AND CANYONS.

WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

$$

CAZ046-190400-
/O.CON.KLOX.WI.Y.0099.000000T0000Z-070419T0400Z/
SANTA MONICA MOUNTAINS RECREATIONAL AREA-
309 PM PDT WED APR 18 2007

..WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING...

A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING.

AREAS OF NORTHWEST TO NORTH WINDS OF 25 TO 35 MPH WITH GUSTS TO 50
MPH WILL CONTINUE INTO THIS EVENING. THE STRONGEST WINDS WILL BE
THROUGH AND BELOW PASSES AND CANYONS.

WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH
PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

$$

SIRARD
